project.name: Bristleback Client API
project.description: The Bristleback Client: JavaScript library, providing simple and powerful API to cooperate with the server side

Bristleback.controller.ActionExceptionHa.name: Bristleback.controller.ActionExceptionHandler
Bristleback.controller.ActionExceptionHa.description:
Action exception handler class allows to fully control exception handling process.
Instance of this class is created for every action, action class, action callback object and
also there is one exception handler in action controller object.

Bristleback.controller.ActionCallback.name: Bristleback.controller.ActionCallback
Bristleback.controller.ActionCallback.description:
This class is the highest level response handler used in server actions.
Action callbacks can be placed as last parameter in server action invocations.
Action callback contains fields for both normal and exception responses.

params.name: responseHandler
params.description: handler function taking one parameter (actual response object from server).

Bristleback.controller.ActionController.name: Bristleback.controller.ActionController
Bristleback.controller.ActionController.description:
Action controller is a default, built in data controller used in Bristleback Server.
Action controller uses server and client action classes to communicate with server.
Name of this controller: 'system.controller.action'. To use action controller,
server must have it enabled in configuration.

Bristleback.controller.ActionClass.name: Bristleback.controller.ActionClass
Bristleback.controller.ActionClass.description:
ActionClass is a client representation of server action class defined on Java side.
Using this class, user can invoke server actions and specify how to handle normal/exception responses.
Action class instances should not be created using directly this constructors,
but using {{#crossLink "Bristleback.controller.ActionController/getActionClass"}}{{/crossLink}} method

Bristleback.controller.Action.name: Bristleback.controller.Action
Bristleback.controller.Action.description:
This is a single server action definition, created within a server action class.
This class provides fluent API for building action behaviour.
Constructor of this class should not be used directly by application user.
User should rather create action using {{#crossLink "Bristleback.controller.ActionClass/defineDefaultAction"}}{{/crossLink}}
and {{#crossLink "Bristleback.controller.ActionClass/defineAction"}}{{/crossLink}} .

Bristleback.controller.ClientActionClass.name: Bristleback.controller.ClientActionClass

params.name: name
params.description: name of this client action class

Bristleback.Client.name: Bristleback.Client
Bristleback.Client.description:
This class is a WebSocket connection abstraction. It uses WebSocket object to connect and communicate with the server.
Single Client object represents a single client-server connection. There can be multiple instances of this class
(there can be multiple connections from single browser tab).

classitems.description: Controllers container
Creates a new action message

Sets a default exception handler function that will be invoked when exception handler for given exception type
cannot be found or it has been found and returned "false".
classitems.name: setDefaultExceptionHandler

params.name: handlerFunction
params.description: exception handler function reference, containing one parameter, which is actual exception message.

classitems.description: Sets exception handler function applicable for exception type given as first parameter.
classitems.name: setExceptionHandler

params.name: handlerFunction
params.description: exception handler function reference, containing one parameter, which is actual exception message.

classitems.description:
Handler function taking one parameter (actual response object from server).
 This handler is invoked in case when non exceptional response is returned by the server.
classitems.name: responseHandler

classitems.description: Exception handler object for specifying reaction for exception responses.
classitems.name: exceptionHandler

classitems.description: Exception handler object for specifying reaction for exception responses.
classitems.name: exceptionHandler

classitems.description:
Gets a server action class with name given as parameter.
If action class doesn't exist, this method transparently creates one
and immediately returns it.
classitems.name: getActionClass

params.name: actionClassName
params.description: name of requested server action class.

classitems.description:
Registers given object as client action class.
After registration, server is able to invoke methods of given client action class.
Client action classes are normal Object instances created in any way.
classitems.name: registerClientActionClass

classitems.description: Exception handler object for specifying reaction for exception responses.
classitems.name: exceptionHandler
defineDefaultAction

classitems.description:
Creates a non default action definition with name given as parameter.
In addition, the action controller creates method and attaches it to this action class.
User can then invoke created action like any other methods.
classitems.name: defineAction

classitems.description:
Invokes default action of this action class on the server side.
Action execution is always asynchronous.
Response handler can be specified by setting handler method in
{{#crossLink "Bristleback.controller.Action"}}{{/crossLink}} object
or by adding additional parameter at the end of parameters list.
Such additional parameter can be function (which will be used when normal, non exceptional response arrives)
or {{#crossLink "Bristleback.CONNECTOR"}}{{/crossLink}} object.
classitems.name: executeDefault

params.name: connector
params.description:
user connection placeholder,
{{#crossLink "Bristleback.CONNECTOR"}}{{/crossLink}} constant should be used.

classitems.description: Gets an action definition with name given as parameter.
classitems.name: getAction

classitems.description: Gets a default action definition.
classitems.name: getDefaultAction

classitems.description: Exception handler object for specifying reaction for exception responses.
classitems.name: exceptionHandler

classitems.description: Sets a response handler function for this action.
classitems.name: setResponseHandler

params.name: handler
params.description: handler function taking one parameter (actual response object from server).

classitems.description:
Gets current client connection state. The returned value is equals to the one of fallowing fields:

 * WebSocket.CONNECTING
 * WebSocket.OPEN
 * WebSocket.CLOSING
 * WebSocket.CLOSED
classitems.name: getConnectionState

classitems.description: Checks whether this client is connected (has connection state equals to WebSocket.OPEN).
classitems.name: isConnected

classitems.description: Checks whether this client is disconnected (has connection state equals to WebSocket.CLOSED).
classitems.name: isDisconnected

classitems.description:
Connects to remote server using configuration passed as constructor parameter.
If connection is not closed in the moment of connection, exception is thrown.
classitems.name: connect

classitems.description:
Sends a message to remote server. Message is serialized using client serialization engine.
This method should generally be not used by application creator. Instead, data controller should be user.
classitems.name: sendMessage

classitems.description:
Disconnects client from remote server.
If connection is not open, exception is thrown.
Creates a new instance of client, using passed configuration object.
classitems.name: newClient

classitems.description: Creates a deep copy of object.
classitems.name: deepCopy

params.name: c
params.description: object that will receive state of first object

classitems.description: This utility method iterates over all fields of given object and returns complete state of it in a "JSON" like way.
classitems.name: objectToString

classitems.description:
Function used to prevent cross site scripting.
You should used it on every message from server that you want to insert into DOM.
classitems.name: escapeHTML

classitems.description: Writes given message in console dom element. If console is not enabled, nothing happens.
classitems.name: log

classitems.description: Enables the Bristleback logging console.
classitems.name: enableConsole

classitems.description: Disables the Bristleback logging console.
classitems.name: disableConsole
